name: TheAtlantic
text: Until Americans have broad access to the vaccine, quarantining is the main thing keeping us healthy. So why aren’t more people doing it? @olgakhazan reports: https://t.co/iAAhC2rG9L

name: TheAtlantic
text: "For secretary of defense, Americans should want someone of broad experience and perspective in civilian life, not the product of an all-absorbing institution," writes @EliotACohen: https://t.co/AntCXnfVKJ

name: TheAtlantic
text: Countries seeking to inoculate their citizens at the expense of everyone else are chasing a false promise, writes @YasmeenSerhan: https://t.co/ypZ8wDqVFf

name: TheAtlantic
text: It's time to take a look at some of the most memorable events and images of 2020. Photos of the disastrous Australian wildfires, the onset of the global coronavirus pandemic, Brexit Day, and much more—via @TheAtlPhoto: https://t.co/HcTQ7gEdt8

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The world that emerges from our year of plague will be altered, in subtle and dramatic ways. No one should be overconfident about exactly how the pandemic will change lives in the long run," @DKThomp writes: https://t.co/zXsEGRTikK

name: TheAtlantic
text: As he prepares to occupy the White House, Joe Biden faces a decision rare in American history, @JamesFallows writes: What to do about the man who has just left office? https://t.co/H3Uq1RdrfW

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @russellberman: Electoral College reform remains a long shot in the near future, but it's not just Democrats who want to change how presidents are chosen: https://t.co/0W0tMHbrxx

name: TheAtlantic
text: Abolishing the controversial Electoral College seems out of the question. But there is still a way around it, @russellberman reports: https://t.co/83Q7bBoTht

name: TheAtlantic
text: “America under Trump became less free, less equal, more divided, more alone, deeper in debt, swampier, dirtier, meaner, sicker, and deader,” George Packer writes. “It also became more delusional.” https://t.co/5FDFYwLm0d

name: TheAtlantic
text:
The president-elect’s team is stuck setting up a new government via video call. The latest Atlantic Daily, by @mimbsy:
https://t.co/W4msAwKlAP

name: TheAtlantic
text: Sign up for the newsletter here: https://t.co/ZY4adCYUKG

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @TheAtlPhoto: Day 9 of the 2020 Hubble Space Telescope Advent Calendar: A Young Nebula. The cosmic pairing of the star Hen 2-427, some 15,000 light-years away, and the nebula M1-67 which surrounds it, which is estimated to be no more than 10,000 years old—just a baby. https://t.co/oVvhgBoeYW https://t.co/5jh76CtT6z

name: TheAtlantic
text: Don’t worry about getting infected by cookies, writes @JamesHamblin. https://t.co/sZjBn1IVfn
